about_the_game:
Funnyland Farms is a revolutionary new entry into First Person Horror. Take control of one of three survivors in the abandoned Funnyland Farms amusement park. Experience the haunting laughter of the park as you navigate the service tunnels, taking care not to be spotted by the rampant and obsessive fans that wander the halls. Your brother is lost somewhere within this maze of death and concrete, but will you find him before Ticklesworth finds you?

As the player, you will be on the hunt for clues to escape rooms, turn on lights, and learn about the disastorious ending to this once joyous vacation spot. You will be armed with weaponry to stab and shoot your way out of dangerous situations with those that still call their park their...disturbing...home. Or if you aren't quite ready for combat choose to sneak past enemies instead. Either way, help your character avoid death to save her brother!

content_descriptors.notes: The following content includes frequent violence involving weaponry such as guns, knives, and hammers, kidnapping, mild gore such as blood, mild profanity, moderate horror surrounding clowns, and references to alcohol-use.

name: Funnyland Farms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700k | AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon 6800XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: Playing on minimum requirements should enable to play on Low/Minimum quality settings in FullHD (1080p) in stable 30 FPS.

short_description: "Welcome to Funnyland Farms, where the laughter never dies... but you just might." A horror first person shooter filled with puzzles, combat, and a crazed amusement park cultists! Shoot, stab, and sneak your way through the abandoned amusement park Funnyland Farms to save your brother.
